structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: Limitations upon project funding in the Kentucky Rural Innovation Program.
law.text:
Project funding in the Kentucky Rural Innovation Program shall have the following limitations:
Award funds shall be used as seed funding as defined in KRS 164.6011;
Award funds may be used for those entrepreneurial training topics specified in KRS 154.1-750(4), if they meet particular objectives of a qualified company as delineated in the project application; and
The amount of a fund award to a qualified company shall not exceed fifty thousand dollars ($50,000) each year for two (2) years, equal to a maximum of one hundred thousand dollars ($100,000).
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 230, sec. 35, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 522, sec. 12, effective July 14, 2000.
